Package au.edu.anu.omhtk.environment

Class LocalEnvironment

java.lang.Object
au.edu.anu.omhtk.environment.Environment
au.edu.anu.omhtk.environment.LocalEnvironment
public class LocalEnvironment extends Environment
An Environment representing the local computer where the application is running. The concept of 'current working directory' is managed here - not by the host OS (because Java can't do it)
Author:
Shayne Flint - before 27/2/2012

  • Constructor Details

    • LocalEnvironment

      public LocalEnvironment​(String rootDir)
      The local environment is local, i.e. it runs the current application in a working directory.
      Parameters:
      rootDir - The root directory of this environment.
